name: Catapong
description:
A little pong-like game made for the PongJam.

Draw paddles and use them as catapults to launch balls toward the opposing goal!

Goal & Rules

Get a ball in the left goal to gain a point

Fail to stop a ball going in the right goal and lose a point

Get as many points as possible before the timer runs out

Controls

[LMB] = Left mouse button

[RMB] = Right mouse button

Click & drag [LMB] - Draw paddle (You can have multiple paddles)

Click [RMB] - Pull paddles

Hold & Drag [RMB] - Aim paddles

Release [RMB] - Release paddles

Cool stuff I used to make this:

Shapes

VHS Pro
